column2:
"Wow, look at all this! Thank you!
Time to think up a new recipe."

"I'm glad I knew such a light-footed
person as yourself!"

"I'll probably be asking you to fetch
other ingredients as I need them.
You don't mind, do you?"

"Oh, and before I forget, here's your
reward. It's the best I can do right now.
Well, see you around!"
